import Link from 'next/link' import { MenuItem } from '@material-ui/core' import { Formik, Form, Field } from "formik" import updateFaculty from '../../../services/faculty/basic-info/updateFaculty' function PersonalInfo(props) { let FacultyDetails = { lastName: props.children.lastName, middleName: props.children.middleName, permanentAddress: props.children.permanentAddress, presentAddress: props.children.presentAddress, mobile: props.children.mobile, landline: props.children.landline, email: props.children.email, civilStatus: props.children.civilStatus, religion: props.children.religion, emergencyContactPerson: props.children.emergencyContactPerson, emergencyContactNumber: props.children.emergencyContactNumber } const cs = [ { id: 1, civil: "Single" }, { id: 2, civil: "Married" }, { id: 3, civil: "Separated (Legally)" }, { id: 4, civil: "Divorced" }, { id: 5, civil: "Widowed" } ] return (

{ await updateFaculty(values) }} > {({ values, errors, touched, isSubmitting }) => (

) } export default PersonalInfo
